text: Business Versus Love is a 1914 American silent short film directed by Tom Ricketts and written by Sydney Ayres. Starring Edward Coxen, Winifred Greenwood, Harry von Meter, and Jack Richardson. ==External links== * Category:1914 drama films Category:1914 films Category:American drama films Category:American silent short films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1914 short films Category:American films
title: Business Versus Love
